features: 【Large Print Keyboard】- The large keys are slightly spaced, featuring big print letters to lowers the chance of hitting the wrong key. Perfect for elderly, the visually impaired, schools, special needs departments and libraries, as well as companies.
【White LED Backlight】- Bright and evenly distributed backlit keys, easy typing in lower light environment. Ideal for studio work, office. Backlit can choose to turn on/off and adjust brightness.

【Full Size & Ergonomics Design】- Unfold the feet at back of the keyboard to reduce hand fatigue and enjoy long hours of playing. Full QWERTY English (US) 104 key keyboard layout with numeric keypad, Large Print keys provides superior comfort without forcing you to relearn how to type.

【Plug and Play & Wide Compatibility】 - This USB keyboard takes away the hassle of power charging or swapping out batteries and is easy to setup. No drivers required.Compatible with Windows 2000/XP/7/8/10, Vista,Raspberry Pi 3/4, Mac OS(Note: Multimedia keys may not fully compatible with Mac, OS System).Works with your PC, laptop.
【After-sales servicet】- We provide 24-hour customer service, no reason 30-day return and refund policy for you. please feel free to contact us, we are pleased to solve any issues you are meet.
body.description: Backlit Wired Keyboard Large Print Backlit Computer Keyboard 4X larger than standard keyboard fonts, clear and easy to read, and can really help those who have trouble seeing keyboards. 4.9 ft long wired USB connection, fast and convenient installation, Plug and Play No Driver Required,Easy to use. Bright and evenly distributed backlit keys, easy typing in lower light environment. On/Off and adjustable backlit switch button for handy control. Maintain normal typing in different lighting conditions without irritating eyes for long-term use. Full Size & Ergonomic Design Keyboard Full-size keyboard provides everything you need at your fingers: the Multimedia/fn keys, numeric pad etc. Only if you use the numbers, you will know how important to get a keyboard with attached number pad!Comfortable Typing ,You’ll Enjoy a Comfortable and Quiet Typing Experience with This Keyboard. Even for a Long Time Typing, You Won't Easily Get Tired.

The large keys are slightly spaced, featuring big-print letters to lowers the chance of hitting the wrong key. Large letters Keyboard has been designed specifically for those with conditions that cause visual impairment or less-than-perfect vision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing since "sliced bread"
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of work at night in a relatively dimly lit home office and although I am a reasonably experienced keyboarder (formally known as a typist), I still need to search for the seldom used keys and symbols. I was looking on Amazon for a keyboard with more legible nomenclature when I ran across this one that not only had larger nomenclature but was also backlit. I had used wireless keyboards for years, but having a wired unit is not a problem with a stationary desk computer. I fell in love with this keyboard out of the box. It is full sized and has a nice feel, is relatively quiet and has almost every feature I have ever seen on any keyboard. The frosting on the cake, however, is the adjustable backlighting which makes it totally functional in a completely dark room. A great feature of the backlighted keys is that the nomenclature is molded into each key and will never wear off as with screen printed keys.I now have 2 of these keyboards because as soon as my wife saw it, she had to have one as well. I think that backlighted keyboards are sort of like heated seats and steering wheels in cars in that they seem like a gimmick at first, but once you use them you will never get a new car without them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This has to be one of the best keyboards that I have ever used. I have a sight impairment, the letters are large easy to see and having the light up is the best. It is also pretty quiet and you hav the option to turn the keyboard lighting off. LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is great for a senior person. Also great for any one that has difficulty with their eyesight. The keyboard has bigger letters and is lit up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The backlit keys are nice. The backlight is very bright and the large print is really easy to see. The keys are tall, maybe to allow for the light to be seen from the sides and below better, but that makes them kind of hard to use. The description indicated it was a 'quiet type' keyboard. I would NOT consider these keys to be quiet AT ALL - I'm really disappointed about that and am considering sending it back because of this. Overall if you're more focused on the large lettering/font and having well-lit, easy to see keys, then this is a good keyboard. If those things aren't as important for you, and having a quiet typing board is more important, I'd look at something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: OK so I'm no gamer but if I had to guess I'd say it's good. THIS KEYBOARD feels great, looks great and makes typing a breeze. I do a ton of editing, so I need to be able to often fly through projects. The backspace gets abused by me but this one can take it. Anyway, you can't go wrong. Worth every penny. Thanks so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The purpose for this purchase is to replace the standard keyboard that comes with the new desktop. I like the light up feature that it has. It's adjustable to suit your style. The keys are also very easy to see and makes computing a lot easier. Especially on the eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and as described
reviews.reviewText: I feel it was worth what I paid for it. Easy to see in all light conditions and silent to type without bothering anyone. Large letters on keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Key is missing from keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my 86yr old father for Christmas. He just opened it this morning. I was very disappointed to find it is missing a key! We hooked it up, and it works, he is able to read the keyboard much easier because of the enlarged font and the back lighting. But the missing key is so obvious! We double checked the packaging, but the key is just not there. Very disappointing!Update: After writing my review I was contacted by the seller who responded quickly to my complaint. They were very helpful and offered to send what I assumed would be the missing key for the keyboard. Today, I received a new keyboard! I'm changing my review to 5 stars. First, my dad has been using the original keyboard and it has helped him so much, he has MD and seeing his keyboard has been a real challenge. This has made it much easier! Second, this seller went beyond what was necessary to make my purchase right. I'm impressed with their service. Thank you so much for making Dad's life a little bit easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice keyboard and it’s easy to see but the two keys that are highlighted are the wrong way around. The @ and the “ keys are in the wrong places. I know where they are now but this is incredibly irritating if you press the @2 key you get “2 and the “ ‘ key you get @‘ this is really really annoying.I am visually impaired and this is not what you need. It spoils what is a reasonably good keyboard but I would say it is also quite flimsy cheap plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: I bought a keyboard from Asda that was better quality
reviews.reviewText: Key spacing is dreadful and sometimes almost unusable.Keys rattle and you seem to have to make stabbing movement while typing.I am sorry but this keyboard really is the worst backlit keyboard I have ever purchased,the only redeeming feature is the backlight.
